#funcion
funcion<-function(x)
{
  fx<-tan(pi*x)
  return (fx)
}

#derivada
derivada<-function(x)
{
  fd<-(1/(cos(pi*x)^2))
  fd<-fd*pi
  return (fd)
}

#Newton
newton<- function(x,y,z)
{
  cat("\n")
  rF<-funcion(x)
  rD<-derivada(x)
  cat("rF ",rF," - rD",rD,"\n");
  
  x1<-x-(rF/rD)
  cat("x1 ",x1,"\n")

  if(y==0){
    y<-x1
    newton(x1,y,z)
  }
  else{
  
  error = 10^-9
    if(z<=error){
      return (round(x1,4))
    }
    if((x1-y)<z){
      newton(x1,y,z/10)
    }
  }
  
}

#main

newton(-1,1,0.9);
